sections.name: Bring the man who is standing in front of the burger shop!
Get the balloon in the skies of Mystic Ruins!
Collect 100 rings, and go to Sonic's billboard by the pool!
Weeds are growing all over my place! I must get rid of them!
I lost my balloon! It's way up there now!
He is going to drown! Help the man in the water!
Lonely Metal Sonic needs a friend. Look carefully.
The Medallion fell under there! No illegal parking please!
Get the balloon floating behind the waterfall of the emerald sea.
What is that sparkling in the water?
Destroy the windmill and proceed. Find the balloon in orbit!
Who is Chao a good friend with? And what is hidden underneath it?
I can't take a shower like this! Do something!
I am the keeper of this hotel! Catch me if you can!
My medallions got swept away by the tornado! Somebody help me get them back!
Get the flags from the floating islands!
Aim and shoot all the medallions with a Sonic Ball.
During night, at the amusement park, place your jumps on the top of one of the tables.
What is that behind the mirror?
Get all the medallions within the time limit! It's really slippery, so be careful!
Protect the Sonic Doll from the Spinners around it!
Find the flag hidden in the secret passage under the emerald ocean!
Go around the wooden horse and collect 10 balloons!
'I hate this dark and filthy place!' Can you find it?
What is hidden under the lion's right hand?
What is that on top of the ship's mast that the pirates are protecting?
Collect 100 rings and head to the heliport!
During the morning traffic, use the fountain to get to the balloon.
I am the keeper of this canal! Catch me if you can!
A fugitive has escaped from the jail of burning hell! Find the fugitive!
Get the balloon as you float in the air along with the trash!
Can you get the balloon that is hidden under the bridge?
Shoot yourself out of the cannon and get the balloon!
Can you get the balloon that is hidden on the ship's bridge?
I am the keeper of this icy lake! Catch me if you can!
Fighter aircraft are flying everywhere. Somebody get me out of here!
Fly over the jungle and get all the balloons!
A message from an ancient people: In the direction where the burning arrow is pointing you will see...
Treasure hunt at the beach! Find all the medallions under the time limit!
What is hidden in the area that the giant snake is staring at?
Look real carefully just as you fall from the waterfall!
I can't get into the bathroom. How could I've let something like this happened to me?
Fortress of steel. High jump on three narrow paths. Be careful not to fall.
I am the keeper of this ship! Catch me if you can!
Go to a place where the rings are laid in the shape of Sonic's face!
A secret base that's full of mechanical traps. Pay attention, and you might see...
Get ten balloons on the field under the time limit!
Can you get the medallion that the giant Sonic is staring at?
Scorch through the track, and get all the flags!
Select a road that splits into 5 paths before time runs out!
Gunman of the Windy Valley. Destroy all Spinners under a time limit!
Get 3 flags in the jungle under a time limit!
Pass the line of rings with 3 Super High Jumps on the ski slopes!
Slide downhill in a blizzard and get all the flags!
Run down the building to get all the balloons!
Relentless eruptions occur in the flaming canyon. What could be hidden in the area she's staring at?
Peak of the volcanic mountain! Watch out for the lava!
The big rock will start rolling after you! Try and get all the flags!
Watch out for the barrels, and find the hidden flag inside the container!
Something is hidden inside the dinosaurs mouth. Can you find it?
